originalText.text: Upon entering the building I was impressed by the cleanliness and warm welcome my son and I received. The receptionists were knowledgeable and prompt. We waited a small time before being called for some machine run testing. Again, the doctors assistants were thorough. Explaining everything before the individual tests. Dr. Cooper exceeded all he could have been! Kind, listened, explained all. Personable and human. Not your ordinary doctor. 10/10

originalText.text: I love my care team at Cooper Eye Care. They are careful to explain each test and what my results are. Dr. Borukhov recommends the best approach to deal with my particular eye prescription. He listens to what I am experiencing and he cares. Thank you!

text.text: I love my care team at Cooper Eye Care. They are careful to explain each test and what my results are. Dr. Borukhov recommends the best approach to deal with my particular eye prescription. He listens to what I am experiencing and he cares. Thank you!

originalText.text: Cooper Eye Care is one of the best healthcare providers I've found in New York City! I've been seeing them for over 15 years...the doctors are smart and friendly, very patient and caring (I see Dr. Eisenberg and love her!) The staff is amazing - friendly, efficient and organized. They've always gone out of their way to help me with my eyecare needs, and I'm amazed at how well their office runs, especially since they are busy and popular! I can't recommend them highly enough!

text.text: Cooper Eye Care is one of the best healthcare providers I've found in New York City! I've been seeing them for over 15 years...the doctors are smart and friendly, very patient and caring (I see Dr. Eisenberg and love her!) The staff is amazing - friendly, efficient and organized. They've always gone out of their way to help me with my eyecare needs, and I'm amazed at how well their office runs, especially since they are busy and popular! I can't recommend them highly enough!

originalText.text: As close to perfect as a visit to a doctor can be. From the moment I arrived at the front desk to the assistant who did the pre exam to Dr. Kim everyone was excellent. I have been coming here since 2008. Dr. Kim' was extremely thorough and she took the time to explain and addressed any of my concerns. In addition to all that I got to see Dr.Cooper again and we chatted about "old guy" stuff together. I would HIGHLY recommend this office to anyone with ocular concerns. Regards  Tom Spinelli

originalText.text: I have been going to Cooper Eye Care for over 10 Years. I have never seen better. In addition, they have been on time for every appointment I have had (I go once every 6 months). Doctor  Eisenberg is my Doctor and provides me with excellent care giving me the complete information I need to understand all aspects of my eye care.
